name: Project AVOID
description:
Project AVOID is a game in which you need to hold your finger on the screen to avoid obstacles. Simple, but infinitely exciting! Earn coins in the game and unlock new levels with even more interesting obstacles. As well as open up new colors and design for the background to give the game a whole new look!

Features:

- Possibility to choose appearance.

- A large number of different levels.

- Unique way every time.

- A lot of tricky moving obstacles.

- Unique visual style.

- Achievements

- Leaderboards
